FutureStruct.Name: FP Pneumatic Parameters
FutureStruct.Param: FP Low Supply Pressure Pilot Threshold
FP Low Supply Pressure Supply Threshold

Variable.Name: Boost Threshold
Variable.Description: [0] - lower, [1] - upper compensation for pneumatic relay "flat spot"

XVariable.Name: FP Boost Threshold
XVariable.Description: [0] - lower, [1] - upper compensation for pneumatic relay "flat spot"

Variable.Name: Pilot Pressure Saturation Limits
Variable.Description: [0]-lower; [1]-upper - pilot pressure limits indicationg actuator saturation (in internal representation)

XVariable.Name: FP Pilot Pressure Saturation Limits
XVariable.Description: [0]-lower; [1]-upper - pilot pressure limits indicationg actuator saturation (in internal representation)

Variable.Name: Low Supply Pressure Pilot Threshold
Variable.Description: Low supply indicator by pilot pressure

XVariable.Name: FP Low Supply Pressure Pilot Threshold
XVariable.Description: Low supply indicator by pilot pressure

Variable.Name: Low Supply Pressure Supply Threshold
Variable.Description: Low supply indicator by supply pressure

XVariable.Name: FP Low Supply Pressure Supply Threshold
XVariable.Description: Low supply indicator by supply pressure

Variable.Name: Pressure Sensor Map
Variable.Description:
A relay-specific map of pressure sensors to the predefined set of A/D channels
 [0] - Actuator 1
 [1] - Actuator 2
 [2] - Supply
 [3] - Pilot
 [4] - Atmospheric
